## HttpErrorConstructor type

Constructor parameters for creating an HttpError instance. Extends CustomErrorConstructor with HTTP-specific properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type HttpErrorConstructor = CustomErrorConstructor<unknown> & {
    responseMessage: string;
};
```
**References:** [CustomErrorConstructor](./error-handler.customerrorconstructor.md)
